ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: I'm glad %s is here. I was getting bored!
Wow! %s put on a great performance!
Check out the awesome bone I dug up in the %s!
Hey, this is trash! What's it doing in the %s?
Hey, look -- here's an empty stage! Let's see if I can get a crowd!
I hope everyone watching me is having as much fun as I am!
Whoa, I almost got stuck in the tar!
This is a great place to learn about extinct animals!
I'm going to help build an extinct animal skeleton!
Wow! Look at this extinct animal's hand compared to mine!
Wow! Look this extinct animal's foot compared to mine!
Boy howdy! Extinct animals sure were ginormous!
If I give the penguin money, you think it might be nice to me?
I learned a lot about fossils today!
